Title: To resolutely listen to the Party's command is the spirit of a strong army
Publisher: CCP Central Propaganda Department - Zhonggong zhongyang xuanchuanbu (中共中央宣传部)
Notes: Full quotation: To resolutely listen to the Party's command is the spirit of a strong army; going into battle, scoring a victory is the essence of a strong army; to legally and strictly command an army is the foundation of a strong army.The sculpture is one of the sculpture groups near the entrance to the Mausoleum of Mao Zedong on Tian'anmen square.
Theme: The Chinese Dream (中国梦) (2012 - )Xi JinpingPeople's Liberation Army
